CustomField.description: This field shows whether the account is a Time Customer, has an Open Opportunity, or is an Unaddressed Time Account. Deprecated as part of ticket #32918
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Intapp_Time__c,"Own it"), ISPICKVAL(Intapp_Time__c,"Own it - Cloud") ), IF( ISPICKVAL(Intapp_Time_Total_Management__c,"Own it"), "Customer (Time)", IF( ISPICKVAL(Intapp_Time__c,"Own it - Cloud"), "Customer (Time - Cloud)", IF( Upsell_Time_Opportunities__c > 0, "Customer (Time): Engaged in Upsell", "Customer (Time): Unengaged in Upsell" ) ) ), IF( New_Time_Opportunities__c > 0, IF( Customer_Status__c = "Customer", "Engaged Customer", "Engaged Non-Customer" ), IF( Customer_Status__c = "Customer", "Unengaged Customer", "Unengaged Non-Customer" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows whether the account is a Time customer, has an open opportunity, or is an unaddressed Time account.
CustomField.label: Time Prospect EXPIRING 3/8
